hymn.title: The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit

layout.singingstanza: The last A -- dam be -- came a life- -- giv -- ing Spir -- it. The Lord is the Spir -- it, the Spir -- it gives life. But he who is joined to the Lord is one spir -- it. Oh, we have been joined to the Lord! We are one spir -- it with Him. The last A -- dam be -- came a life- -- giv -- ing Spir -- it. The Lord is the Spir -- it, the Spir -- it gives life. The last A -- dam be -- came a life- -- giv -- ing Spir -- it, a life- -- giv -- ing Spir -- it. In one Spir -- it we were all bap -- tized in -- to one Bod -- y And were all giv -- en to drink one Spir -- it, one Spir -- it. lyrics.stanza: The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit. The Lord is the Spirit; the Spirit gives life.
But he who is joined to the Lord is one spirit. Oh, we have been joined to the Lord! We are one spirit with Him.
The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit. The Lord is the Spirit; the Spirit gives life.
The last Adam became a life-giving Spirit, a life-giving Spirit.
In one Spirit we were all baptized into one Body And were all given to drink one Spirit, one Spirit.
Ministers of the new covenant, not of the letter but of the Spirit. We are being transformed into the same image From glory to glory, even as from the Lord Spirit.
